mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, title, writer, review, ref_group, rate, board_review.regdate, profile FROM board_review INNER JOIN board_member ON board_review.writer=board_member.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY board_review.regdate desc, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_review (num, title, writer, review, ref_group, rate, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{review}, #{ref_group}, #{rate}, SYSDATE)
